# `scope aliases` for [core](/commands/categories/core.md)

<div class='command-title'>Output info on the aliases in the current scope.</div>

## Signature

```> scope aliases {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | any    |

## Examples

Show the aliases in the current scope
```nu
> scope aliases

```
